meanings.sent1: The uncleanly kitchen had dirty dishes piled up in the sink.
meanings.sent2: She felt uncomfortable staying in the uncleanly hotel room.
meanings.sent3: The uncleanly cat left muddy paw prints all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: The uncleanly pond was covered in algae and debris.
meanings.sent5: The uncleanly hands left greasy marks on the clean paper.

meanings.definition: In a messy or untidy manner
meanings.sent1: She packed her bag uncleanly, causing items to spill out.
meanings.sent2: He dressed uncleanly, with his shirt untucked and shoes untied.
meanings.sent3: The papers were scattered uncleanly across the desk.
meanings.sent4: The children played uncleanly, leaving toys strewn everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The room was cleaned uncleanly, with dust left in the corners.
